info.description: This page provides information about the RESTful API (version 1.0) of AgroLD.
info.title: AgroLD API 1.0 Interactive Documentation

tags.name: ontologies
tags.description: Services over ontologies used in AgroLD

post.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword (e.g. homoaconitate)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term
post.description:
<n> PREFIX rdfs:< http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema# >
SELECT ?id
WHERE {
?subject rdfs:label "homoaconitate hydratase activity"^^xsd:string .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?subject), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?localname)
BIND(REPLACE(?localname, "_", ":") as ?id).
} limit 1

parameters.name: ontoTerm
parameters.description: The ontological term (e.g. homoaconitate hydratase activity)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Returns the name of an ontological element corresponding to its given ID
post.description:
PREFIX rdfs:< http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema# >
SELECT ?id
WHERE {
?subject rdfs:label "homoaconitate hydratase activity"^^xsd:string .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?subject), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?localname)
BIND(REPLACE(?localname, "_", ":") as ?id).
} limit 1

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id (e.g. GO:0003824)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term
post.description:
SELECT ?ancestorId
WHERE
{
#level 4
{
SELECT ?ancestor1
WHERE
{
?subject rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor1.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?subject), CONCAT(REPLACE("id", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1}
?ancestor1 rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor2.
?ancestor2 rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor3.
?ancestor3 rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor4.
BIND(REPLACE(str(?ancestor4), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?ancestorLocalname)
BIND(REPLACE(?ancestorLocalname, "_", ":") as ?ancestorId)
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0004409 or G0:0016836)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The level of the ancestor (e.g. the level of the direct parent is 1)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Returns the parents of an ontological element given its id
post.description:
SELECT ?ancestorId
WHERE
{
{
SELECT ?ancestor1
WHERE
{
?subject rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor1.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?subject), CONCAT(REPLACE("id", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1}
?ancestor1 a owl:Class .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?ancestor1), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?ancestorLocalname)
BIND(REPLACE(?ancestorLocalname, "_", ":") as ?ancestorId)
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0004409)

parameters.name: _page

parameters.name: _pageSize

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Returns the descendents of an ontological element given its id
post.description:
SELECT ?ancestorId
WHERE
{
{
SELECT ?ancestor1
WHERE
{
?subject rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor1.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?subject), CONCAT(REPLACE("id", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1}
?ancestor1 a owl:Class .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?ancestor1), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?ancestorLocalname)
BIND(REPLACE(?ancestorLocalname, "_", ":") as ?ancestorId)
}

post.summary: Returns the children of an ontological element given its id
post.description:
SELECT ?ancestorId
WHERE
{
{
SELECT ?ancestor1
WHERE
{
?subject rdfs:subClassOf ?ancestor1.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?subject), CONCAT(REPLACE("id", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1}
?ancestor1 a owl:Class .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?ancestor1), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?ancestorLocalname)
BIND(REPLACE(?ancestorLocalname, "_", ":") as ?ancestorId)
}

parameters.name: _page

post.summary: Get ids of QTLs associated with an ontological Id
post.description:
SELECT DISTINCT ?qtlI
WHERE
{
{
SELECT ?ontoElt
WHERE
{

?ontoElt rdfs:subClassOf ?ontoEltClass.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?ontoElt), CONCAT(REPLACE("ontoId", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1
}
GRAPH agrold:qtl.annotations{
?qtl ?predicate ?ontoElt .
?qtl rdfs:subClassOf < http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/SO_0000771> .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?qtl), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?qtlId) .
}
}
ORDER BY ?qtl
LIMIT _pageSize
OFFSET _page

parameters.name: ontoId
parameters.description: The id of the ontological element (e.g. EO:0007403)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return

post.summary: Get ids of proteins associated with an ontological Id
post.description:
SELECT DISTINCT ?proteinId
WHERE
{
{
SELECT ?ontoElt
WHERE
{
?ontoElt rdfs:subClassOf ?ontoEltClass.
FILTER REGEX(STR(?ontoElt), CONCAT(REPLACE("ontoId", ":", "_"), "$"))
} limit 1
}
?protein ?predicate ?ontoElt .
?protein rdfs:subClassOf < http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/SO_0000104 > .
BIND(REPLACE(str(?protein), '^.*(#|/)', "") AS ?proteinId) .
}
ORDER BY ?proteinId
LIMIT _pageSize
OFFSET _page

parameters.name: ontoId
parameters.description: The id of the ontological element (e.g. GO:0003824)

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set (> 0 or else all results will be displayed)

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return
